channel.title: Need a coder for a RSPS
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Am hiring a coder to work with my current coder or solo up to you to create me a RSPS.
Am looking to create a RSPS one which I will be aiming to make a great success, in order to achieve my goals I am going to need an exceptional coder.
I'll be wanting to see evidence of your past work.
This will obviously be a full time commitment, I'll be looking to turning this into a successful server for the joy and the income reward.
Things I want the server mainly based on:
PVP based mixed with a bit of PVM A lot of donator benefits Donator shop Multiple different donator status's Vote point shop
I have a forum/graphic designer awaiting.
I'll be paying for the Dedi , all advertisement fee's and anything else that will need to be paid for.
I understand there's a lot of RSPS'S already out there which is why Iv'e set a budget of $1,000 to start this project off.
Am only looking for an exceptional coder who will be dedicated to the project.
DON'T JUST GET HOLD OF ME BECAUSE YOU WANT SOME CASH, YOU MUST BE AN EXCEPTIONAL CODER.
Payment will be discussed in private.
For more information add me on skype "tom.popplestone" letme your from here.
Thanks,
Tom.

item.title: Need a coder for a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Elfbow Elfbow
item.description:
@Elfbow wrote:

Added you have to add me too, skype is screwed.

Burrickz

Read full topic
item.source: Need a coder for a RSPS

Hey guys,
